works.description:
This notification is to inform you  
that "flower-picspot.blogspot.com" is in posession of a stolen copyrighted  
photo (cherry blossom closeup, created and edited by J.Freeman), and is  
being displayed publicly on website "1.bp.blogspot.com" with URL  
address "http://flower-picspot.blogspot.com/2011/06/cherry-blossom.html"  
under the heading "Cherry Blossom Flower" tagged with photo  
filename "cherry-blossom-2.jpg."  Please remove it immediately.  This is  
official notification under the provisions of Section 512(c) of the Digital  
Millennium Copyright Act (“DMCA”) to effect removal of the aforementioned  
infringements.  I request that you immediately issue a cancellation message  
as specified in RFC 1036 for the specified postings and prevent the  
infringer, who is identified as "Way2earns" on your Blogger and/or Blogspot  
web address, from posting the infringing photographs to your network  
servers in the future.  Please be advised that law requires you, as a  
service provider, to “expeditiously remove or disable access to” the  
infringing photographs upon receiving this notice. Noncompliance may result  
in a loss of immunity for liability under the DMCA.  I have a good faith  
belief that use of the material in the manner complained of here is not  
authorized by me, the copyright holder, or the law.  The information  
provided here is accurate to the best of my knowledge.  I swear under  
penalty of perjury that I am the copyright holder.  Please send me at my  
provided address a prompt response indicating the actions you have taken to  
resolve this matter.  Sincerely, J. Freeman [e-mail: jettfree@yahoo.com]  
with electronic signature & date/ time stamp.  [cc: G.McClure, Esq.]
